segments.text: Over to the left, I'm watching two children in action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing on a small two-step stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched right up into an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is plunged into a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, perhaps to collect his spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Below him, a girl stands with her arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite the determined little team, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about that stool tipping over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and get seriously hurt, maybe even break the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a rather clever, if risky, operation they have going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
